    • Constructor Detail

      • Camera1Manager

        @UiThread
public Camera1Manager(DeviceManager deviceManager,
                                AccelerometerManager accelManager,
                                ICameraStrategyFactory cameraStrategyFactory,
                                CameraListener cameraDelegate,
                                CameraSettings settings)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        accelManager - Accelerometer manager that will provide information about phone movements. Must not be null.
        cameraStrategyFactory - Factory that will create camera resolution chooser strategy.
        cameraDelegate - Camera delegate that will be notified with new frames from this camera manager.
        settings - Additional specific settings for camera manager.

      • startPreview

        @UiThread
public void startPreview(DeviceManager deviceManager,
                                   CameraSettings factorySettings,
                                   ICameraManager.CameraStartupCallback cameraStartupCallback)
        This method should be called on resuming the activity. It will reopen camera, restart focus and accelerometer management and prepare camera callbacks.
        Specified by:
        startPreview in interface ICameraManager
        Parameters:
        deviceManager - Device manager object required to determine phone information.
        factorySettings - Camera factory settings required to rebuild camera strategy.
        cameraStartupCallback - Callback that will receive all events from camera thread while preview is being started

      • getPreviewCallback

        protected abstract android.hardware.Camera.PreviewCallback getPreviewCallback()
        Method should return a callback which will receive preview frames.
        Returns:
        Preview frames callback.

      • stopPreview

        @UiThread
public void stopPreview()
        This method should be called on pausing the activity. It will pause the frame grabbing, pause the focus and accelerometer management and it will close the camera to save power.
        Specified by:
        stopPreview in interface ICameraManager

        protected int calculateBufferSize(android.hardware.Camera.Size previewSize,
                                  int format)
        If buffered preview callback is used, this method is used to calculate the necessary buffer size.
        Parameters:
        previewSize - Size of the camera preview.
        format - Format of the camera preview.
        Returns:
        Size of the buffer.

      • prepareCameraParameteresAndFocusManager

        protected abstract IFocusManager prepareCameraParameteresAndFocusManager(android.hardware.Camera.Parameters params)
        This method prepares parameters for camera before starting the preview and returns the focus manager that must be used (focus management is bound to camera parameters).
        Parameters:
        params - Parameters for camera that have to be prepared.
        Returns:
        focus manager that will be used for managing the focus.

public java.lang.Boolean isAutofocusSupported()
        Description copied from interface: ICameraManager
